title: This New Aero Bike at Sea Otter Claims to Be the Fastest in the World
content:
Just how much faster is it than the competition? Stromm Cycles says to expect as much as 30 watts saved at 'sprint speeds.'

Read the full article at This New Aero Bike at Sea Otter Claims to Be the Fastest in the World on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
